title: You got lucky
body:
Why is it that when you have a bad game you are a bad player and should not play? Regardless of why you had a bad game, you could have just been playing bad, no chance to gank, counter picked, whatever.

But because you had a bad game, all those other games you played were just luck and should not have happened?

The attitude of this community is fucking retarded. You get no thanks for having a good game and carrying your team, but you get reported for having a bad game, your fault or not.

Do you lot really get off on being negative at everything? Do your lives suck that bad that you have to come here and vent at everyone? What is the deal, can't you just try and be nice?

replies.body: Same reason we look at the adc when he gets a penta and not the support who carried that bitches ass since it was just a wee noob adc. People are stupid dude. It's as endless as space.
What if the ADC was genuinely good and got the penta without getting carried? I don't play ADC much but I'm pretty sure not all of them are as shit as you seem to think.
An ADC's early game relies heavily on their Support. For the first 15 minutes bot lane is a match up of Supports gaining their side an upper hand.
I didn't say they don't rely on supports, I merely said that not all ADC's are as shit as he seems to think.

I'm sorry what?

Your one of the twats that always blames his team mates, shown by like half of your boards posts.

Get off your god damn high horse.

And you are that twat who thinks he can carry any game from any position and is better than everyone else, that is all you do here tell people that they could have done more and won the game etc etc.

I was even warned about you and look, here you are again.

Yeah, it depends on how you are perceived in the game by your teammates. I've had bad games, where I've died the most on my team and the worst looking KDA, yet my teammates are arguing and blaming another teammate for the loss, simply because that teammate was perceived as more annoying in chat, (or at least it seems so)
Because, there are bronze/12 year old that think losing is the end of the world and have a 33% win rate themselves and shit KDA's (1/23/1 then say they carried)
